body:
Did you compute a calibration factor and set it in raw2hdr using the -C
option?  You need to do that, and it won't be the same calibration factor
as the one you use for the JPEG route.


-Greg


On Wed, Feb 15, 2017 at 9:05 AM, Mahlab, Seyedeh Farzaneh <far.mahlab at ku.edu
